name: GPM is Ugly
description: Google Play Music looks really ugly so I made it look better. It's really sad that they keep making it worse too. Feel free to edit it for yourself.
additional_info:
Anything on Listen Now is hidden because I don't care about any of it. The style will be updated to hide any new garbage Google tries to put on that page as well.

Version:
2.7 [7.7.17] - HBD HQ. Google celebrated by adding some trash bar on the right side so we fixed that fast
2.6 [6.26.17] - GPM was doing so well at not making things ugly but then they changed the search box so now we gotta go fix that trash
2.5 [11.15.16] - One more cheeky button thing appeared only to be promptly removed; fix selection background
2.4 [11.14.16] - They tried to make the home page as trashy as possible but I quickly put a stop to that; Also fixed the search bar and added a Chihiro since we don't want to support GPM ugliness
2.3 [09.20.16] - Playlist button should show up in some smaller windows, updated screenshots
2.2 [09.07.16] - Something something Google broke more things with selected background color
2.1 [08.18.16] - Fixed dumb new playlists bar & finally fixed the loading screen
2.0 [08.17.16] - Changed to black background for some new useless white bar they added
1.9 [04.11.16] - Killed some background images that were showing when viewing a playlist
1.8 [03.14.16] - Google went and made some retarded changes again so a lot of fixes needed to be done
1.7 [02.23.16] - Changed background to black in #maincontainer when viewing long playlists
1.6 [01.01.16] - Changed background of Queue to black for when only a few songs are in the queue
1.5 [11.05.15] - Removed some ugly subscribe button on the slide out menu
1.4 [10.27.15] - Removed some white borders on Playlists page, updated URL so only Music page changed
1.3 [10.24.15] - Google once again changed stuff just to break all the CSS; fixed it with this update
1.2 [10.17.15] - black background is switched from #maincontainer to core-header-panel#nav-container
1.1 [10.16.15] - added black background for #maincontainer
1.0 [10.15.15] - initial
